Class OrderPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.OrderPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class OrderPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    OrderPanel class which inherits from JPanel holds an JList, JTextField, Button and ArrayList to processing the "basket"
    Author:
    stk4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
